Project:

HTML5 game 'echo'

Find out more ▶
About:

Initially built for the Github Game Off 2012 in 30 days, echo is an ongoing HTML5 game project which employs experimental WebGL and Web Audio APIs running on a web browser. It's a game where you collect, recycle and destroy sounds on your way to the king of space. Demo, source code and detailed description of the game available via the link on the left.

Other projects:

Built on Skeleton framework. Huge thanks to Edie Freedman from O'Reilly Media for design inspiration.
